name: Squirtle
description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

favoriteAbility.name: Hydro Pump
favoriteAbility.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Pikachu
description: Whenever Pikachu comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity.

favoriteAbility.name: Thunderbolt
favoriteAbility.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

favoriteAbility.name: Gust
favoriteAbility.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

name: Ditto
description: When it spots an enemy, its body transfigures into an almost perfect copy of its opponent.

favoriteAbility.name: Transform
favoriteAbility.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

name: Onix
description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

favoriteAbility.name: Rock Throw
favoriteAbility.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

name: Raticate
description: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

favoriteAbility.name: Hyper Fang
favoriteAbility.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

name: Magikarp
description: For no reason, it jumps and splashes about, making it easy for predators like Pidgeotto to catch it mid-jump.

favoriteAbility.name: Splash
favoriteAbility.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

name: Clefairy
description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

favoriteAbility.name: Moonblast
favoriteAbility.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Golbat
description: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.

favoriteAbility.name: Poison Fang
favoriteAbility.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

name: Caterpie
description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

favoriteAbility.name: Tackle
favoriteAbility.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

name: The Ethical Hacker
description: Revealed a security flaw in an ethical way, their wisdom message: 'Psst. You are exposing your database credentials on Github-'

favoriteAbility.name: Ethical hacking
favoriteAbility.description: The reveal of a security flaw within an online application without causing harm.
